reviews.author: Coffee Enthusiast
reviews.text: Some of the best coffee in Berlin and at an astounding price!

reviews.author: Local Customer
reviews.text: Very high quality coffee. Perfect flat white. Rich, smooth coffees made with high quality beans and silky milk foam.

reviews.author: Regular Visitor
reviews.text: Great place to take your laptop and work. Relaxing atmosphere and good music. The coffee is outstanding and the staff is always very friendly.

reviews.author: Berlin Resident
reviews.text: Cozy ambience with board games available. In-house coffee roasting machine. Great WiFi and quaint outdoor seating near Tempelhof feld.
